attributes.action: get sky to cut prices for live football in pubs and clubs
attributes.additional_details: I drink in the hardwick club banbury if the club wanted sky for live football sky would want 1500 pound a month this scandalous for some pubs its 3 grand with pub and clubs going due to david cameron tax on beer.its not like the murdock empire is short of money they gave rebbecca brooks a 10 million pay off please sign my e-petition cameron does not get it mark cherry banbury labour party

rejection.details: The Government can't interfere in commercial arrangements.
